comments.author: Brian Whitman
comments.body: Had to take out the absolute / in the file refs on the patch but after I did that the patch works and fixes the compile problem.

description:
Build.xml for Highlighter does not work when compilation is triggered by clean core dist call.

Patch has changes to fix this by updating build.xml to follow xml-query-parser build.xml
summary: Build file for Highlighter contrib works when run in isolation, but not when core dist is run
